title: Solvere Fortified Moisturizer - 2 Oz Jar
features: A lightweight, strengthening, hydrating and healing cream for acneic skin.
This lightweight cream from Solvere is the final step to a clearer complexion.
It replaces the healthy hydration lost during targeted acne treatments, and restores a natural balance.
Vitamins A, C and E with green tea extract and co-Q10 work to heal, protect and fortify devitalized skin. Glycerin and squalane soften and soothe for a smooth, comfortable finish.
